text: Ke kaloku satyumbela uMûsâ iintsuku ezingamashumi amathathu, Saza Songeza nezinye ezilishumi, walifeza ke uMûsâ ithuba (elo wayelityunjelwe) yiNkosi yakhe leentsuku ezingamashumi amane. Wathi uMûsâ kumntakwabo uHârûn: “Thabatha indawo yam wena kubantu bakuthi, wenze (izinto) ngeNdlela eLungileyo, ungalandeli indlela yabenzi bobubi.”
